Statement Number Four -
a Hongkong hospital when the Hai Chi arrived there said the
cruisers were subjected to a merciless fire from the forts at Bocca
Tigris and were attacked by 100 airplanes which dropped 1000 bombs.
Fact Number Four - One of our aviation friends in Canton told us that
the river at Bocca Tigris is only one half mile wide with the forts
on either side but neither of the ships were hit.
The air force was
turned out but they could only find a few pilots and of the eight
Hawks and ten Boeings only four motors could be started and
then had a foreed lending right after the take off - the other
three had machine guns but the wrong sized ammunition.
They did drop
52 bombs of which seven exploded but not near enough to the ships to
Statement Number Five - Many dead and wounded on the
two cruisers.
got hurt when he fired a grease filled rifle at the forts and
the rifle exploded,.
one officer was cut by broken glass (probably
when he dove through his stateroom door).
Now the cruisers are in Hongkong coaling presumably for a trip
Maybe the Canton Air Force will attack
them again when they
leave Hongkong or maybe the Nanking Government will heed Canton's
request and send the cruiser Haining in pursuit.
The Hai Chi and
Shan were built in 1898 and wouldn't have much of a show against
Japanese built Haining acquired only a few years ago - the
pride and joy of the Chinese Navy - which for effectiveness is sur-
passed only by the Swiss Navy.
Maybe you will read some exciting
cable dispatches long before this reaches you.
At any rate this
letter is just within the family and I know that you will keep it
confidential.
CNAC continues to prosper in spite of the growing depression
in Shanghai.
A. P.A.A. Western Division Ford is in service from
